body.name: Solo Stove Color Pack 10 Color Changing Fire Packets, Adds Magic Fire Colorful Flames to Your Fire Pit & 4 Potential Fire Color - Blue, Green, Purple, and Yellow - Firepit Accessory for Outside Pits
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 3 hrs 18 mins
features: WIDE ARRAY OF COLOR FLAMES: Each pack of fire color packets has a potential to display variety of campfire color flames to your flame while in use. Toss a color pack into your fire pit and watch the flames dance between blue, green, purple, and yellow.
LONG LASTING WITH GREAT VALUE: Contains 10 Color Packs which burns up to an hour. The shelf life of this no smoke pop of colored fire is up to 30 years. Weight is .882 oz or 25 grams per pack.

DO NOT USE WITH FOOD: Make sure you roast your marshmallows before adding this color fire packets to the flame of your firepits. The fire color changer is made from copper sulfate, sodium chloride, potassium chloride.
EAST TO USE: Simply take color flames for fire pit and drop it into the fire to get the light show started. Take your flame to the next level with a pop of color.

PERFECT FOR SOLO STOVE FIRE PITS: Goes perfectly with your favorite Solo Stove firepit. Whether you use the portable Stoves or one of our best selling fire pits, this is the perfect add-on accessory to enjoy your colorful fire outside.
body.description: Solo Stove Color Packs Take your flame to the next level with a pop of color Impress your family and friends with a magical light show on a cozy night outdoors around the fire pit. These color fire packets add a little extra to your fire for special occasions and make children's and grown up's eyes sparkle with joy. Simply toss one or two of these unique magic fire colorful flames into your fireplace and be enchanted with the flames change colors between blue, green, purple, and yellow. CONTENT: Pack of 10 LONGETIVITY: Each pack burns up to 1 hour ARRAY OF COLORS: Blue, Green, Purple and Yellow FEATURE: No smoke fire color

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Solo Stove Color Packs Known for quality craftsmanship and durability, our fire pits pack away into portable heavy duty carry cases and are ready for any adventure. To give you a varied experience with your favorite fire pits, Solo Stove introduces the fire accessory for outside which turns your fire color in your firepits to magical, colorful gathering experience - the Color Packs. Solo Stove Color Packs Take your flame to the next level with a pop of color Impress your family and friends with a magical light show on a cozy night outdoors around the fire pit. These color fire packets add a little extra to your fire for special occasions and make children's and grown up's eyes sparkle with joy. Simply toss one or two of these unique magic fire colorful flames into your fireplace and be enchanted with the flames change colors between blue, green, purple, and yellow. CONTENT: Pack of 10 LONGETIVITY: Each pack burns up to 1 hour ARRAY OF COLORS: Blue, Green, Purple and Yellow FEATURE: No smoke fire color

Exuberant Color Flames The Solo Stove Color Packs will let you enjoy the play of colorful fire for up to one hour. Each package contains 10 Color Packs. It's perfect when you have this little something with the firepit. Light Show for Your Fire Pit To reap the maximum functionality of the Color Packs, toss in two for an over the top color changing light show. Simply take a fire color changer packet and drop it into the fire to get the light show started. Do not open your Color Pack before use. Precaution When Using Color Packs are not food safe. They are made from copper sulfate, sodium chloride, potassium chloride. Make sure you roast your marshmallows before adding a fire color to your flame.

Solo Stove Color Pack Solo Stove Handle Solo Stove Shield Solo Stove Stand Solo Stove Shelter Solo Stove Sticks and Tools Bundle Made from OR Material Copper Sulfate, Sodium Chloride, Potassium Chloride Stainless Steel Stainless Steel Stainless Steel PVC-Coated Polyester Stainless Steel Usage Adds color to your fire pit flames Carries your fire pit anywhere Defends your outdoor spaces from fire sparks Supports the base of your firepit Protects your fire pits from the natural elements Helps you to easily grip your fire logs & roast your food Perfect for fire pits YES - all types of fire pits YES (depends on size) YES (depends on size) YES (depends on size) YES (depends on size) YES - all types of fire pits

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2022
reviews.reviewText: These are awesome! They give off many colors in our bonfire. They last a real long time too. At least a good hour! What a great buy! I’ll definitely be buying these again. Thumbs up 👍🏻 for sure!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun for entertaining
reviews.reviewText: This is just simple fun and visual when your chilling fireside, def use 2 packs for each burn to get full effect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars does what it says

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes bright colorful flames
reviews.reviewText: One packet produces bright colorful flames. A nice addition the to Solo Mesa stove. I would not recommend using this if you are going to roast marshmallows as the burnt metals are exhausted into the air and you don't want to get the metals in your marshmallows.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just enjoy the moments..
reviews.reviewText: Fire pit on a late night.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun birthday gift!
reviews.reviewText: The small solo stove along with wood chips and this celebration “color”Was the perfect birthday gift for the guy who is impossible to buy for.He really seemed to get a kick out of it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
